purpose: Document and share a comprehensive log of learning resources and insights related to AI and machine learning.
principle: Curates and organizes learning materials and notes across various AI and ML topics, making them accessible and searchable.
reusability: The repository serves as a public resource for anyone interested in AI and ML, offering categorized insights and references.
limitations: Primarily a static collection of notes and resources; not an interactive learning platform or tool.
name: learning
description: A log of things I'm learning
highlight: Extensive compilation of AI and machine learning learning resources and personal insights.
